text: Poistine, grom polnost'yu podchinyayetsya Allakhu Vsevyshnemu. Soprovozhdayushchiy yego grokhot, kotoryy vy slyshite, kak budto golos, kotoryy v znak glubokogo smireniya proslavlyayet Allakha, prevoznosit Yego za to, chto On yego sozdal. I vosslavlyayut Yego takzhe angely - svyatyye, chistyye, nezrimyye dukhi. On nisposylayet ognennyye vosplamenyayushchiye molnii, porazhayushchiye tekh, kogo On pozhelayet. No, nesmotrya na eti yasnyye znameniya, podtverzhdayushchiye mogushchestvo Vsevyshnego, mnogobozhniki prepirayutsya ob Allakhe Vsevyshnem, a On Vsemogushch, Mudr i silon v otrazhenii kozney vragov
